name: Hercules Panhellenios
text: Wealth of Experience — Action: Search your deck for a card with the uses keyword and add it to your hand. (Limit once per round.) "Ne'er hath the Prince of Power bothered with coin of the realm! It seemed such a trifle!”

name: Hercules
text: Godlike Stamina — Action: Deal 2 damage to Hercules or give him a stunned status card → draw up to your printed hand size. (Limit once per round.) “Less talking and more fighting. For Olympus!”

name: Feat of Strength
text: Requirement ([physical]). (While paying for this card, spend the listed resources.) Hero Action (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. Reduce the cost of the next card you play this round by 1. “There's something I have to do. A labor to complete.”

name: Have at Thee!
text: Hero Action: Until the end of the round, Hercules gains retaliate 1 and each time an enemy attacks, you may declare Hercules the defender without exhausting him (using your DEF). “Thou wouldst dare strike the Lion of Olympus?!”

name: Mighty Blow
text: Hero Action (attack): Deal 4 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using only [physical] resources, stun or confuse that enemy. “What do you want from me? I punch stuff. It falls down! That's the only 'strategy' I've ever needed!”

name: Divine Intervention
text: Uses (1 divinity counter). Hero Interrupt: When you reveal an encounter card, remove 1 divinity counter from here → cancel all of that card's effects and discard it. "Gods of Olympus, hear my prayer!" —Hercules

name: Olympus
text: Hercules Panhellenios gets +2 REC. Cards that you control with the uses keyword enter play with 1 additional counter on them. “Olympus, land of beauty and hope unlimited, of art, music and poetry unsurpassed!” —Hercules

name: Godlike Endurance
text: Uses (3 endurance counters). Interrupt: When you use a basic power, exhaust Godlike Endurance and remove 1 endurance counter from it → ready your identity. “The Lion of Olympus never tires!” —Hercules

name: Godlike Strength
text: Uses (3 strength counters). Resource: Exhaust Godlike Strength and remove 1 strength counter from it → generate [physical][physical] resources. “None can match the strength of Hercules!” —Hercules

name: Godlike Fury
text: Hercules gains retaliate 1. Hero Action (attack): Discard 1 card from your hand and exhaust Godlike Fury → deal 2 damage to an enemy. “Ha! You have earned the full wrath of a god!” —Hercules

name: Hercules' Helm
text: Hercules gets +1 THW. Hero Action: Exhaust Hercules' Helm → draw 1 card, then choose one card in your hand and place it on top of your deck. “'I see you. Not with sorcery, with thermal imaging.”

name: Hercules' Mace
text: Restricted. Hercules gets +1 ATK. Hero Response: After you give an enemy a status card, deal 2 damage to that enemy. “I bring you the gift...of battle!"

name: Immortal
text: Response: After you take damage, heal 1 damage from your identity. (Limit once per phase.) Interrupt: When you would take damage that would defeat you, discard Immortal instead. “...is there some part of 'immortal' you don't get?"

name: Shield of Perseus
text: Uses (1 gaze counter). Restricted. Hercules gets +1 DEF. Hero Action: Remove 1 gaze counter from here → stun each enemy in play. Give the villain a tough status card.
